dorks.name: Movie Files
dorks.query: filetype:avi OR filetype:mkv OR filetype:mp4 OR filetype:wmv OR filetype:mov OR filetype:mpg

dorks.name: Streaming Sites
dorks.query: intitle:"Streaming Server" intext:"Stream View" intext:"View Playlist" -inurl:(jsp|pl|php|html|aspx|htm|cf|shtml)

dorks.name: Movie Streaming Links
dorks.query: intitle:"Index of" inurl:ftp OR inurl:http OR inurl:https movie mkv OR avi OR mp4 OR wmv OR mov OR mpg
